summary: The code executes a script to unload existing multi-server instances, creates a directory for multiserv with permissions and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named "myramdisk" within the "multiserv" directory with an allocated size of 10M.

details.comment: The code executes a script to unload existing multi-server instances, creates a directory for multiserv with permissions and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named "myramdisk" within the "multiserv" directory with an allocated size of 10M.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
./unloadmulti.sh
sudo mkdir multiserv
sudo chmod 777 multiserv
sudo mount -t tmpfs -o size=10m myramdisk multiserv
